root.name: Ninja Baseball Bat Man
root.description: PlotSome of the most prized treasures from the Baseball Hall of Fame have been stolen, and the Commissioner of Baseball needs YOU to get them back! But is there more to this quest than meets the eye? Who is really behind the theft? CharactersCaptain Jose. The balanced fighter.Twinbats Ryno. The speed fighter.Beanball Roger. The strength fighter.Stick Straw. The long-reach fighter.
